plot: Nick and Mike are two corporate entertainers, the lowest form of life in the performing world, who will do almost anything, including throwing away their dignity, in order to provide for their families.
plot_en: Nick and Mike are two corporate entertainers, the lowest form of life in the performing world, who will do almost anything, including throwing away their dignity, in order to provide for their families.
plot_es: Nick and Mike are two corporate entertainers, the lowest form of life in the performing world, who will do almost anything, including throwing away their dignity, in order to provide for their families.
title: Fools for Hire
